Accessibility

A website that works for everyone performs better for everyone

Accessibility is a quality standard that improves usability, protects your brand, and helps more people complete meaningful actions on your website.

Why clients invest in accessibility

  • Better experience across all devices and user situations.
  • Higher trust and stronger brand perception.
  • More completed forms, checkouts, and key interactions.
  • Lower risk as accessibility expectations keep rising globally.

Basic Accessibility Audit

  • Quick-win remediation list.
  • Risk and impact summary.

Shiny Pro

Robust Accessibility Audit

USD 1,490

  • Expanded page-set and journey review.

Accessibility pricing comparison

Compare Shiny accessibility audit plans side by side to choose the right scope for your team.

Shiny accessibility audit plan comparison by price and coverage.
Plan Price Best for What you get
Shiny Start USD 590 Teams that need fast clarity on core issues. Core page review, WCAG snapshot, quick-win remediation list, risk summary.
Shiny Pro USD 1,490 Teams improving accessibility and conversion outcomes together. Expanded journeys, friction map, prioritized fixes, 90-day roadmap.
Shiny Premium USD 2,990 Organizations needing broad coverage and executive alignment. Deep template audit, compliance-growth plan, workshop and rollout priorities.
